plot outline: Arun (Vikram Prabhu) runs a drama troupe with like-minded friends but sadly there is no big reception. In order to make some money, they start a firm called Unnal Mudiyum Thambi (UMT) through with they literally write script and execute it to help the romantically challenged youngsters. Everything goes well until a businessman called Santhosh (Navdeep) approaches UMT as he badly wants to marry Maya (Keerthi Suresh).
title: Idhu Enna Maayam
plot: Arun, a struggling theatre artiste, and his friends start a website that helps men to unite with the women of their dreams. Everything turns upside down when Arun has to put his own love at risk.

Arun (Vikram Prabhu) runs a drama troupe with like-minded friends but sadly there is no big reception. In order to make some money, they start a firm called Unnal Mudiyum Thambi (UMT) through with they literally write script and execute it to help the romantically challenged youngsters. Everything goes well until a businessman called Santhosh (Navdeep) approaches UMT as he badly wants to marry Maya (Keerthi Suresh).::Suresh
